definition: not feel ashamed to ask and learn from one's subordinates
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: If you want to learn, you must not be above asking questions.
sentences.chinese: 你如果要学习，就要不耻下问。

sentences.english: Do not shamed ask others about studying.
sentences.chinese: 在学习上应当不耻下问。

sentences.english: The director condescended to take advice from the stagehand.
sentences.chinese: 导演向舞台管理人员不耻下问。

sentences.english: If you want to learn, you must not above asking questions.
sentences.chinese: 你如果想学就要不耻下问。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, best of all, she is not above asking questions.
sentences.chinese: 然而，最棒的是她不耻下问。

sentences.english: He did not feel ashamed to ask and learn from his subordinates, so he could manage everything for the best.
sentences.chinese: 因为他不耻下问，所以他能把各种事情都处理得很好。

sentences.english: You shall not be above asking question.
sentences.chinese: 在学习上应当不耻下问。

sentences.english: When we do not know what to do, we ask.
sentences.chinese: 当我们不懂如何做时，我们不耻下问。

definition: instructing with tireless zeal (idiom, from Analects)
to go to the bottom of things (idiom)
pinyin: da3 po4 sha1 guo1 wen4 dao4 di3

definition: receptive as an echoing canyon (idiom); modest and open-minded
no end to learning (idiom); There's always something new to study./You live and learn.
to accept criticism gladly (humble expr.)/to be happy when one's errors are pointed out
to learn is to know one's ignorance (the Book of Rites 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])
pinyin: xue2 ran2 hou4 zhi1 bu4 zu2
